title: Competition: Win Two Tickets to Festival No. 6
body:
Now that we’ve all calmed down, a bit, from the Warehouse Project Announcement, you can all get excited again as we have a pair of tickets available to win for the fantastic Festival No.

6

Festival No.6 is a pioneering festival concept bringing together music, arts and culture in the most incredible festival location. Festival No.6 takes place over the weekend of 13-15 September, 2013 in the eccentric surrounds of Portmeirion, Wales, home of the cult TV series The Prisoner.

The line-up already includes **Manic Street Preachers,** **Chic Ft Nile Rogers, My Bloody Valentine,** **James Blake, Frankie Knuckles, ****Carl Craig, Gilles Peterson, Greg Wilson, Everything Everything** alongside CitR favourites **MONEY**, **Laura Mvula** and **London Grammar**, and many more as well as a diverse range of arts and cultural happenings. There will also be high quality food, late night ghost walks, secret parties, torch lit processions and more.

For your chance to win the pair of tickets, all you have to do is one of the following –

1.  [Share our facebook post of this article](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=686326551394372&set=a.186589161368116.52794.114090381951328&type=1)
    
2.  [RT (and follow) our twitter post of this article](https://twitter.com/crackintheroad/status/360344742036389888)
    

<

p>The winner will then be chosen at random, and informed via facebook or twitter. This competition closes at 11:59pm on 28th July, 2013

To buy tickets or for more information please visit [www.festivalnumber6.com](http://www.festivalnumber6.com/)
